授業目的: Students will work on extending their fluency of expression through activities centered around a topics-based syllabus. Critical thinking with a cross-cultural perspective will be fostered on a range of topical issues to do with lifestyles, customs and behavior, with the intention of raising student awareness of aspects of their own culture and similarities or differences in other cultures. Vocabulary work will seek to broaden understanding of collocation patterns and familiarity with idiomatic language.
到達目標: Students will be trained to express their opinions in short speeches and presentations. While building listening and oral skills, the course will also provide practice in English writing patterns so that students are able to construct effective messages.
授業方法: On-demand delivery of lessons, etc. created separately by the class instructor and will offer Zoom consultations as needed.
